title: Tetromino Wear - Watch Face
summary: Android Wear watch face that builds the time out of falling Tetrominoes.
developerAddress:
D30 InfoLab21
Lancaster University
Lancaster,
LA1 4WA
United Kingdom
description: Customisation options:- Choice of Tetromino styles from Classic, Modern and Minimal.- Choice of animation speed.- 24 and 12 hour time formats.- Show date below the time in retro text with many formats available.- AM/PM indicator.- Watch battery indicator.
descriptionHTML:
Customisation options:
- Choice of Tetromino styles from Classic, Modern and Minimal.
- Choice of animation speed.
- 24 and 12 hour time formats.
- Show date below the time in retro text with many formats available.
- AM/PM indicator.
- Watch battery indicator.
comments: Like the watchface, but Avast Antivirus identifies it as a serious threat.
My Antivirus (not Avast, like a previous reviewer stated) also indicated that this well done and whimsical watch-face contained known Malicious Code.
Like this a lot but would love the option to add a background, watch feels a bit empty with all the black
I like it, but the time in 12hr isn't showing am/pm correctly
All fixed. Still getting used to that Wear 2.0 works.
I installed and instantly gained a 6 pack. 10/10 would install again.
recentChanges: - Android 2.0 preparation â€“ watch face can be installed as a standalone application from the watch Play Store (with reduced customisation). Including watched paired with iPhones.
- Removed colour and solid blocks in ambient mode to prevent screen burn in.
- Fixed the low bit ambient mode bug (present on the Asus Zen Watches and Sony Watches).
